NoServers: There are no servers you have access to
Name: Server Name
NoEditableVars: This server does not have variables you can edit
ConfirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this server? (this cannot be undone)
NoReadme: No readme available for this template
Autostart: Start the server when the node starts
Autorestart: Restart the server when it stops normally
Autorecover: Restart the server when it crashes
